faq.title: FAQ
faq.a1: Clouvel is an MCP server that runs alongside Claude Code. It records every error with root cause analysis, warns you before repeating past mistakes, and blocks coding until you have a spec document.
faq.a2: CLAUDE.md is static rules you write by hand. Clouvel learns automatically from your actual errors and decisions.
faq.a3: Yes. Pro license activation needs internet once. After that, everything works fully offline.
faq.q4: Does it touch my code or project files?
faq.a4: No. Clouvel is an MCP server - it provides tools to Claude Code but never modifies your source code.
faq.a5: Yes. 10 real tools that work. Pro adds full history, pattern learning, cross-project memory, and the complete manager review.
